pgmacdesign.ptcropmanager.interfaces

Interface MainActivityListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity

    public interface MainActivityListener
    The listener is designed to be a link between the Activity and the Fragments

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setToolbarTitle(java.lang.String str)
      Set the toolbar title (In the top center of the screen)
      void showOrHideLoadingAnimation(boolean bool)
      Either display or hide the loading animation to cover up the screen

    • Method Detail

      • showOrHideLoadingAnimation

        void showOrHideLoadingAnimation(boolean bool)
        Either display or hide the loading animation to cover up the screen
        Parameters:
        bool - if true, will show, else will not

      • setToolbarTitle

        void setToolbarTitle(java.lang.String str)
        Set the toolbar title (In the top center of the screen)
        Parameters:
        str - String to set. If null or empty, will set as ""
